name: Rescavengers
description:
Best game of the MalagaJam Week 11

Competitive / Cooperative gameplay for 4 players. Repair the mechatank before the others to ensure your spot in the cockpit or driving the legs, them deliver mayhem among the rest of the scavengers before you run out of batteries.

Better played with 4 countrollers. Left joystick to move, A to Start / Drop / Pick Up and Shoot

Keyboard:
Player 1: Arrow Keys + 1
Player 2: AWSD + 2
Player 3: IJKL + 3
Player 4: Numpad Arrows + 4
